effect.shortEffect: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.
effect.full: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved. This ability cannot be nullified.

description.sun-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
description.sword-shield: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
